column2:
b'$TVC and $TVE are found under NYSE equities, not bonds.  https://t.co/it14HPYtNA
https://t.co/rBLaQlkJ7z

I downloaded the list of bonds, here.  https://t.co/0iXD7XS19x

Tennessee Valley Authority has plenty of Power Bonds listed in the bonds section too.

Any other bonds?'

b'$WBA CEO TO Detail Huge Partnership Agreement With Leading US Company As Early As Monday 
https://t.co/Mv3xmUJu9A

$KCDMY $TVC $BANCpC $SKREF $MCBI $EUENF $EANRF $RILYZ $OVLY $SNHNL $XREG'

b'The NYSE @NYSE has a stock $TVC with the name "Tennessee Valley Authority Common Stock" that is actually a $25 bond.

You can 'put' it any time by turning it in for $25.  It earns a resettable interest rate, currently 2.134%

https://t.co/1eJrHlrf50

A bond disguised as a stock!'
